pr_title: CB-8611. Implement CB flow for CM based diagnostics collection (DistroX)

timeline.message: CB-8611. Implement CB flow for CM based diagnostics collection (DistroX)
CB-8611. Implement CB flow for CM based diagnostics collection (DistroX)

CB-8611. Implement CB flow for CM based diagnostics collection (DistroX)
details:
- adding new CM based diagnostics flow for distrox & stack (stack api will be used for SDX flow)
= flow has 4 steps (similar as filecollector based), init/collect/upload/cleanup
- init/upload/cleanup steps are reused from the filecollector flow (initialization: create required configs for filecollector, upload - send data to cloud storage, cleanup - delete files from filecollector location)
- collect phase: run diagnostics command against CM, wait for it to finish, then copy collected file from /tmp folder (to fit into the filecollector flow, so we can upload the file)
- disable PHONE_HOME parameter globally for CM, there is no phone home option for the Api command, so that's the easiest way
- adding roles endpoint in order to know what roles can be filtered
